::Killfest/EndBringer/Greven/Scyther/Demise/Goldeneye/Darkmouse::

Killfest ducks under four missiles, one of them hitting him and 
making him step back. He was a big bot, but he doubted he could take 
missile after missile for much longer than double the time a normal 
bot could. He'd have to be more careful.

He fires four more explosive beams at Megatron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer falls back from the net, initialy thinking it consisted of 
energon. He laughs when he realizes it was electricity. What were 
these bots trying to do, power him up? His armor, specially designed 
to reroute all electricity he takes in to his tentacles, does its 
job. EndBringer growls as one of Marine's missiles hits him in the 
shoulder, destroying one of his missile launchers. The other missile 
sails over his chest, since EndBringer was laying on the ground.

EndBringer jumps up and charges at Tankorr with a roar, his tentacles 
ready. His scanners kept watch behind him, tracking Marine.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Over a dozen bullets from Tarantulus pelt Greven's heavily-armored 
form, but the bot barely notices. He roars, charging at Tarantulus. 
Sweeping the four missiles aside with one large arm like they were 
nothing, Greven fires four missiles (two missiles each from two 
missile launchers). One of the missiles missiles by a long shot, 
catching a tree on fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Still cloaked, Scyther angles sharply up, Akron barely touching him, 
but still draining energy. He growls, gaining altitude and taking out 
a spare cloaking device. He puts it on Darkmouse, cloaking her.

Scyther fires three charges at the middle of Putam's back as he sees 
the Energonian attacking Goldeneye.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Goldeneye twitches as the energy flows through her. She struggles, 
trying to get away.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise walks out of the CR and then out of the base. He looks around, 
getting his bearings and then charging toward the battle site, 
ripping trees out of his way with his huge claws.







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        As the shots bhurst apon Megatron, he sailed back into a 
nearby tree. 
> His left eye began to stream mech down his face in a terible sting. 
He rolled 
> forward and took a spot of cover. Thinking a moment, he rose to 
face Killfest 
> and blasted 5 concussion missles at the bot. 
>       
>

come into 
> contact slam into his armored backside. He thuds closer to 
Endbriger, held 
> out his right arm, and in the upper section a small compartment 
flies open 
> and shoots out a large electricaly charged net at Endbringer.
>        Meanwhile, Marine see's Endbringer, and, from behinde, sends 
three 
> large missles sailing for his large knee caps.
> 
>        Akron plummits for a few moments from the shots, then flips 
up and 
> sends his fist in a course for Scyther's jaw. Once there, not only 
would he 
> break it, but he would drain some of the bots energy.
> 
>        Tarantulas, still in vhicle mode, races around the battle 
scene. His 
> left back tire explodes from Greven. Once transformed he takes out 
his chain 
> gun and a round of twenty shots of him. And, to top it off, he 
sends another 
> batch of cluster missles at the bot.

from

and spirals

>

females 
> throat, sending a shockwave of energon energy through her.

the guns

holding on

shotgun,

two steams

takes out an

fire

energon binding

bot fell
